Package fr.istic.aco.editor

Interface Engine

All Known Implementing Classes:
EngineImpl
public interface Engine
Main API for the text editing engine

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    copySelectedText()
    Copies the text within the interval specified by the selection control object into the clipboard.
    void
    cutSelectedText()
    Removes the text within the interval specified by the selection control object, from the buffer.
    void
    delete()
    Removes the contents of the selection in the buffer
    String
    getBufferContents()
    Provides the whole contents of the buffer, as a string
    String
    getClipboardContents()
    Provides the clipboard contents
    HistoryManager
    getHistory()
    Retrieve the history of states of the buffer
    Selection
    getSelection()
    Provides access to the selection control object
    void
    insert(String s)
    Inserts a string in the buffer, which replaces the contents of the selection
    boolean
    isRecording()
    Check if the engine is recording the sequence of commands
    void
    pasteClipboard()
    Replaces the text within the interval specified by the selection object with the contents of the clipboard.
    void
    redo()
    Forward to the next state in the buffer
    ArrayList<String>
    replay()
    Recover the list of recorded commands
    void
    setBuffer(Buffer b)
    Set a buffer object as the buffer used by the engine
    void
    setSelection(int start, int stop)
    Set the selection to start and end at certain indexes
    void
    startRecording()
    Start recording the sequence of commands
    void
    stopRecording()
    Stop recording the sequence of commands
    void
    undo()
    Return to previous state in the buffer

    • getSelection

      Provides access to the selection control object
      Returns:
      the selection object

    • getBufferContents

      Provides the whole contents of the buffer, as a string
      Returns:
      a copy of the buffer's contents

    • getClipboardContents

      String getClipboardContents()
      Provides the clipboard contents
      Returns:
      a copy of the clipboard's contents

    • cutSelectedText

      void cutSelectedText()
      Removes the text within the interval specified by the selection control object, from the buffer.

    • copySelectedText

      void copySelectedText()
      Copies the text within the interval specified by the selection control object into the clipboard.

    • pasteClipboard

      void pasteClipboard()
      Replaces the text within the interval specified by the selection object with the contents of the clipboard.

    • insert

      void insert(String s)
      Inserts a string in the buffer, which replaces the contents of the selection
      Parameters:
      s - the text to insert

    • delete

      void delete()
      Removes the contents of the selection in the buffer

    • setSelection

      void setSelection(int start, int stop)
      Set the selection to start and end at certain indexes
      Parameters:
      start - beginning index of the selection
      stop - ending index of the selection

    • startRecording

      void startRecording()
      Start recording the sequence of commands

    • stopRecording

      void stopRecording()
      Stop recording the sequence of commands

    • isRecording

      boolean isRecording()
      Check if the engine is recording the sequence of commands
      Returns:
      wheter the engine is recording or not

    • replay

      ArrayList<String> replay()
      Recover the list of recorded commands
      Returns:
      the list of recorded commands

    • undo

      void undo()
      Return to previous state in the buffer

    • redo

      void redo()
      Forward to the next state in the buffer

    • setBuffer

      void setBuffer(Buffer b)
      Set a buffer object as the buffer used by the engine
      Parameters:
      b - buffer to be set

    • getHistory

      HistoryManager getHistory()
